casebody.data:
99-0436 (La. 4/1/99)

George R. DOUGLAS and Bonnie Morales v. ALLIED-SIGNAL INC., et al. No. 99-CC-0436. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999.

IN RE: Allied Signal Inc. Et Al. — Defendants); Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs; Parish of Orleans Civil District Court Div. “K” Number 93-9533; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, Number 98CW-2841 ’

Denied.

JOHNSON, J. not on panel.
